item.description:
Dealing with Addictive Tendencies

Most people have addictive tendencies, whether to food, love, sex, romance, tv, computers, spending, shopping, compulsions, gambling, moneymaking, spending, etc. You'll explore yours, look at the underneath layers that motivate the addiction and ways to limit the addictive tendencies in healthier ways.

7-10pm

Traditional cost $40, sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and a leading expert on the Enneagram, with close to 20 years experience teaching the Enneagram and other personality systems like the Myers-Briggs. He is a psychotherapist in Arlington, MA, a personal coach, workshop leader, organizational trainer. He is writing his second book on Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
also www.meetup.com/The-Arlington-Singles-Events
item.name: Dealing with Addictive Tendencies
